name: Star Iliad
storyline:
In the lore of the cosmos, there is told the tale of the Star Whale, a celestial entity of unfathomable size that roams freely among the stars.

Within its astral body, legend whispers, is hidden a treasure of unspeakable worth, coveted by rulers and adventurers from every corner of the galaxy.

For millennia, this great enigma has evaded the grasp of those who dare to seek its secrets. And yet, the mystery of the Star Whale endures, beckoning the brave to chase its fleeting shadow.
summary:
Star Iliad is a Metroidvania adventure game set within this celestial leviathan - now in development!

Dive into the guts with Star Iliad, a retro-future action adventure game. Play as Blythe Braves, a star ranger stranded within the labyrinthine organs of the mythical Star Whale. Fight fearsome foes, sling spells and bullets, and befriend a charming set of castaways in your quest to escape.
